meanings.sent1: She remained unfazed by the loud noise outside.
meanings.sent2: He was unfazed by the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent3: Even when the cat knocked over the vase, she stayed unfazed.
meanings.sent4: Like a rock in a storm, he stood unfazed amidst chaos.
meanings.sent5: Her unfazed demeanor in the face of adversity inspired others.

meanings.sent1: The old book looked unfazed by the passage of time.
meanings.sent2: The sturdy tree remained unfazed by the strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The unfazed clock kept ticking despite the power outage.
meanings.sent4: His unfazed expression hid the turmoil within him.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood unfazed by the changing seasons.
